description: This file defines version 1 (v1) of a FastAPI-based REST API router for a task management system. It includes endpoints for health check, listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting tasks, interacting with MongoDB as the datastore.

classes.name: HealthOut
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the health check response, indicating service status and MongoDB connectivity.

methods.name: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] _get_db()
methods.description: Helper function to get the current MongoDB database connection.

methods.name: HealthOut health_v1()
methods.description: Endpoint to perform a health check, verifying service status and MongoDB reachability.

methods.name: List[TaskOut] list_tasks( limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of tasks to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of tasks to skip"), db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list tasks with pagination support.

methods.name: TaskOut create_task( payload: TaskCreate, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new task.

methods.name: TaskOut get_task( task_id: str, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific task by its ID.

methods.name: TaskOut update_task( task_id: str, payload: TaskUpdate, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to update a task partially by its ID.

methods.name: dict delete_task( task_id: str, db: Optional[AsyncIOMotorDatabase] = Depends(_get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a task by its ID.
